_sText:
++THIS MAP IS FINISHED, CHECK OUT THE FINAL VERSION HERE++ This is a final beta. I'll be compiling the true final version in about a week, after taking suggestions and acting upon them. This is still a fully functional surf map, with 4 levels and 1 finish. All players spawn with an m3 (pump shotty) and a knife in the spawn-kill proof spawn area (see screenshot D). The surf ramps resemble a double helix which span 4 areas. Mayhem and fragging ensues on the ramps and the jail. Players are teleported to jail with weapons and locations equivalent to how far they got, heres that list:
Fail on first level - Bottom of jail with only knife. Fail on second level - 2nd tier of jail with glock and knife. Fail on third level - 3rd tier of jail with deagle and knife. Fail on fourth level - 4th tier of jail with m4 and knife. Beat fourth level - Top of jail with Awp and knife.
Also included (in the bspzip, only one file ;P) are some custom decals I made for the spawn. Enjoy!
